duties_responsibilities.duty: Provide legal advice on asset management contractual, regulatory, and legal issues, including Investment Company Act matters.
Offer guidance to investment personnel and business management on legal and regulatory requirements, and assist with regulatory examinations.
Prepare, review, and file SEC registration statements, proxy statements, and fund shareholder reports.
Draft, review, and negotiate derivative and other trading agreements on behalf of ETFs and retail funds.
Participate in global working groups related to implementation of regulatory changes and coordinate with fund counsel.
Assist in drafting fund policies and procedures within the framework of regulatory and legal compliance.
Represent legal department on various internal or external committee meetings.

education_certification.credential: J.D. from a reputable law school with a minimum of 6+ years’ experience as a lawyer in a mid to large firm, the government, or in the legal department of a financial services company.
